text:
@senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC Maybe the 2 of you should worry more about the unprecedented corruption currently going on in the WH:
-Political hits on IGs
-Illegal Saudi Arms deal Pompeo was being investigated for
-Coronavirus response money being funneled through private sector business w/ties to the Trumps
